meanings.definition: A person whose job is to collect and empty bins.
meanings.sent1: The binmen come every Tuesday to pick up our trash.
meanings.sent2: The binmen work hard to keep our neighborhood clean.
meanings.sent3: The binmen found a lost kitten in the bin and rescued it!
meanings.sent4: The binmen are like silent heroes, cleaning up after us without complaint.
meanings.sent5: I always wave to the binmen when they drive by in their truck.

meanings.sent1: We saw the binmen walking down the street together.
meanings.sent2: The binmen wear reflective vests for safety while working.
meanings.sent3: The binmen accidentally dropped their lunch in the bin they were emptying!
meanings.sent4: The binmen, with their strong arms, swiftly lift the heavy bins.
meanings.sent5: The binmen's truck rumbled loudly as they made their rounds.
